${ModID}:Anemia.NAME: Anemia
${ModID}:Anemia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL Poisoned enemies.

${ModID}:LethalShot.NAME: Lethal Shot
${ModID}:LethalShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison and !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BleedItOut.NAME: Bleed It Out
${ModID}:BleedItOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Trigger the enemy's Poison.

${ModID}:BoosterShot.NAME: Booster Shot
${ModID}:BoosterShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Enemy heals !${ModID}:m2! HP.

${ModID}:RangersSetup.NAME: Ranger's Setup
${ModID}:RangersSetup.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put 2 cards from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Scheme.NAME: Scheme
${ModID}:Scheme.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the first card you play that costs 1 or less is played twice. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:ScrollOfIntellect.NAME: Scroll of Intellect
${ModID}:ScrollOfIntellect.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ScrollOfIntellect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Sustenance.NAME: Sustenance
${ModID}:Sustenance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Poison to a random enemy. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:TheEncyclopedia.NAME: The Encyclopedia
${ModID}:TheEncyclopedia.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 of !M! random cards to shuffle into your draw pile. They cost 2 less. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards to add to your draw pile.

${ModID}:TomeOfIntellect.NAME: Tome of Intellect
${ModID}:TomeOfIntellect.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Scrolls *of *Intellect into your draw pile. At the start of your turn, shuffle 1 more in.
